enhanced_by.reason: The getOption method relies on options being added to the Options instance via the addOption method.
This method also adds options to the Options instance, which is necessary for getOption to retrieve them.
Both methods check for the existence of an option, making hasOption useful for asserting the presence of an option before calling getOption.
getMatchingOptions can be used to verify that the option returned by getOption is among the expected options, especially when dealing with partial matches.
